I think you would be a great teacher.
Dorothy, what are your plans for Christmas?
Oh yes, it is Christmas, is not it?
I am not sure what I will be doing then.
Well, if you do not have any plans, you family could have dinner at my house.
That is genuinely nice of you, thanks.
Have you finished your shopping yet?
No, I still must do that.
I think I will go to the mall this weekend.
It is going to be really crowded at the mall.
You should shop online.
You are right.
My family loves to read, so I can get them all presents fromAmazon.
What do you think you will get for your wife?
A romance novel.
It seems like she is always reading one of those.
Do not you think you should get her something a little more expensive, like jewelry or a new computer?
You are right.
It is hard buying gifts.
My wife has everything she wants.
I should just ask her.
Martin, for whom are you going to vote?
Do you mean for president?
Yes.
I am not sure yet.
You should make up your mind soon.
The election is next month.
Yes, I know.
I hear about it every day on the news.
I am going to vote for Obama.
He is an excellent choice, but I think McCain would make a good president also.
I know.
They are both good.
It is hard to decide.
McCain is older but he has more experience.
Obama has a lot of clever ideas, but some people say he wants to raise taxes.
I heard he wants to lower taxes.
It is hard to know what the truth is.
That is the reason I really do not pay attention to politics.
Yes, it can be frustrating, but it is important, and it is interesting to watch.
Hey John.
Can I talk to you for a minute?
Sure, what is up?
I wanted to let you know about a book club I joined a couple of months ago.
I know you do a lot of reading so I thought you might want to come with me next month.
Oh, that sounds like fun.
When does the group meet?
Usually, the last Saturday of the month at 9:30 in the evening.
Is that too late for you?
No, that is ok.
What do you talk about in the group?
Well, every month we choose a new book.
And then during the next meeting we discuss it.
What book are you reading now?
The Kite Runner.
I have heard that is a delightful book.
What is it about?
It is a delightful book.
I am almost finished.
The book is about a boy who grows up in Afghanistan during the 1980s.
It is called the Kite Runner because the main character takes part in a kite flying competition.
That sounds interesting.
I would love to come.
Ok, great.
The next meeting is not for another two weeks.
So you still have time to read the book.

name_lesson: A Hiking Trip (Nature and the Environment)

list_detail.w_english: Hi, Anne!
Did you sign up for the trip on Saturday?
What trip is that?
I did not know there was a trip on Saturday.
The hiking club is going to Bear Mountain.
The bus drops us off at the bottom.
And we are going to hike until we get to a cabin halfway up the mountain.
That sounds great!
Where can I sign up?
See Jennifer.
She will help you sign up.
What activity will we do when we get to the cabin on the mountain?
Well, it takes seven hours to hike to the cabin.
So it will be late by the time we arrive.
After we unpack, we will start a campfire.
Then we can sing, eat, and tell stories around the fire.
The following day we will leave at dawn and hike to the top of the mountain.
After we take pictures, we will hike back down.
If we have time, we might go swimming in the lake on the mountain!
Those sound-like fun activities, and I cannot wait to go!

name_lesson: Save the Turtles (Nature and the Environment)

list_detail.w_english: Have you heard about the plan to save turtles in Mexico?
No.
What is the story?
Turtles are in danger of becoming extinct around the world.
Every year, thousands of turtles lay eggs on the beach.
After the turtles lay their eggs in the sand, people come along and take them.
I suppose the people like eating turtle eggs.
Exactly.
Turtles are beginning to stay away from certain places, now.
There are fewer and fewer of them left.
There is a new project in Mexico to save these eggs.
Then turtles will not become extinct.
It is a particularly good project.
Is there anything we can do to help?
I am going to call the Environmental Protection hotline.
They might have some information about the project to help save turtles in Mexico.
They might even have a brochure.
Let us find the website on my computer.
Oh, here it is.
The address is enviro.
There is plenty of information here.
Great!
Let us see what we can do to help save turtles in Mexico.
Listen to this!
This newspaper article says that some scientists are working on a new kind of airplane.
People can use these "flying cars" for short trips.
How interesting!
The article says the first flying car might be ready within the next few years.
That is quite soon! How would this be flying car work?
Can anybody use one, or is it only for people who know how to fly airplanes?
You do not need to be an airplane pilot to use a flying car.
The article says there would be a computer inside the car that would know where you want to go.
The driver does not need to control the car unless something goes wrong.
Does the article say how much a flying car would cost?
It will cost too much money!
We would not be able to afford one.
True, but would not it be nice to fly over traffic jams.
Instead of sitting in the middle of them?
Yes, But then we might end up with traffic jams in the sky!
Hello, and welcome to Roebuck's.
How may I help you?
I would like to buy my wife a home appliance for her birthday.
What sort of appliance are you looking for, sir?
I think a dishwasher might be the perfect gift because it will help with the housework.
Oh yes, dishwashers are especially useful.
This one here is our most popular model.
How does it work?
It is amazingly simple.
First, collect your dirty dishes and scrape off the leftover food into the garbage can.
Then, rinse the dishes in the sink.
Put glasses, cups, and cutlery on the top rack.
Plates, bowls, and pots face down on the bottom rack.
Then, fill this compartment with detergent and close the door.
Next, choose the wash cycle, and finally, press the start button.
You will have sparkling clean dishes in 45 minutes!
That sounds easy to use.
I think my wife will really like it.
How much does it cost?
You are lucky, sir!
It is on sale this week for $400.
Great, I will take it!
Look at the telescope I got for my birthday.
That is neat!
Yes, now we can look at the moon.
Did you know that the moon is the Earth's only natural satellite?
No, I did not know that.
I thought the moon was a planet.
Well, a planet moves around the sun, but a satellite moves around a planet.
Oh, I see.
Can you see other planets with your telescope?
Sure, I can see two planets close to Earth well.
Which planet is closest to Earth?
Mars is the closest planet to Earth.
Many scientists believe that Mars once had rivers and oceans just like Earth.
Mars has two moons.
That is cool!
What is the other planet near Earth?
The other planet near Earth is Venus, but Venus has no moons.
Do you think people will ever be able to visit Mars or Venus?
Someday people will be able to visit Mars, but not Venus because it is too hot.
Well, at least we can see them with your new telescope!
What are you looking at, Billy?
This is a copy of my favorite painting.
It is the Mona Lisa by Leonardo da Vinci.
Why is that your favorite painting?
Well, there are a few things that make the Mona Lisa great.
First, she has no eyebrows.
Second, she has a beautiful smile.
Most of all, I like the soft colors of the painting.
Have you seen the Mona Lisa before?
It is an incredibly famous painting!
Of course!
I have seen the painting a few times before.
But I never noticed that her eyebrows are missing.
I wonder why she has no eyebrows.
Do you know why?
At the time da Vinci painted it.
It was fashionable for young Italian girls to shave off their eyebrows.
Every girl wanted to be fashionable.
Wow! That is interesting!
In what year was the Mona Lisa painted?
It was painted sometime between 1503 and 1505.
I wonder what a modern Mona Lisa would look like.
She might have purple hair!
Do you like photographs?
What kind of photos?
Photos of plants and animals, for example.
Or mountains and oceans.
The photographs a nature magazine would publish.
That is right.
Of course! I love nature photos.
They are incredibly beautiful.
Some of them are very colorful.
Yes, Most nature photos are so interesting.
Sometimes, I buy nature magazines just for the photos.
Me, too.
I like taking nature photos with my camera.
But they are not particularly good.
My photos are not good, either.
Famous nature magazines only publish particularly good photos.
That is true.
People must be incredibly talented to get their photos published.
Yes, Why are we suddenly talking about photographs?
Is there an exhibit somewhere?
How did you guess?
There is an outdoor exhibit going on right now.
Really?
Yes, Nature photographs from all over the world are on display.
That sounds great!
I would love to see it.
Me, too.
Would you like to go with me?
Sure, How about Sunday morning?
OK, It will be fun to see all those photos!
It is nice to see you, Karen.
How have you been?
I have been very well, thank you.
How are you, Dan?
I am fine, thanks.
I went to the movies Saturday night.
I wanted to invite you, but you were not home.
That is right, I went karaoke singing with some friends on Saturday night.
Really?
I have never sung karaoke.
What is it like?
I had never gone karaoke singing before either, but I had a wonderful time.
My friends were experienced karaoke singers, so they showed me what to do.
Did you have to sing in front of a lot of strangers?
No, the place we went to rented out small private rooMS
Nobody else could hear us.
They even gave us free sodas!
Cool! What kind of music did they have?
They had hundreds of different songs to choose from.
They had both new songs and old songs.
They had songs in English and songs in several other languages, too.
It was fun!
I think I will go karaoke singing next weekend!
Did you watch the latest episode of that new reality show last night?
There are so many of those reality shows these days.
Which one are you talking about?
It is called "Good Fences", and it is all about neighbors.
This reality show is the only one I like, because you are right, the others are just silly.
I never watch reality shows at all.
I prefer to watch shows that teach me about something.
Like science and nature programs, and travel shows.
Oh, I like travel shows, too.
My favorite travel show is the one with that chef from England.
He travels, cooks, and eats all the time!
I like that one, too.
He really makes me laugh.
He has a good sense of humor.
Let us watch it together this week.
It is on Thursday at eight o'clock, right?
That is right, but where shall we watch it?
Well, I have a big-screen TV and a comfortable sofa.
OK, we will watch it at your place then, and I will bring some snacks.
See you then!
OK, great.
We will meet you in an hour.
Bye.
Who was that on the phone, Jane?
That was Amy.
She wants to meet us in front of her apartment building in an hour.
Why are we meeting her there?
Because her apartment is close to the bus stop.
We are going to go downtown and watch a movie, so hurry up and get ready.
Oh, I honestly do not think I should watch a movie tonight.
I am studying for an important test on Tuesday, so I really do not have time to have fun!
You have been studying for several days, Joe.
You do not need to study anymore.
You need to have some fun because you are too tired to study, anyway.
I do not know, you are right.
Is it just Amy and us going?
Lily is coming along, too.
Really?
I need time to take a shower and get dressed!
Do not worry, you have time.
It will be fun to see Lily and fun to watch a movie together.
I told you so!

name_lesson: Tickets to the Game (Art and Culture)

list_detail.w_english: You will not believe this, but I have some great news!
I have two tickets to the baseball game next Saturday.
Did I hear you correctly?
Do you have two tickets to the baseball game?
How did you get those?
I thought it was impossible to get tickets because they were all sold out last month!
It was easy.
My colleague and her husband must go to London that week, so they will miss the game.
They offered me their tickets, and of course I was happy to accept.
You are so lucky!
Who are you going to take with you?
I was thinking that you would like to go.
Otherwise, I might take my brother instead.
Do not do that, I would love to watch the game with you!
I was just joking.
I know you really want to go.
Where shall we meet on Saturday?
Well, the game starts at nine o'clock in the morning, right?
Yes, shall we meet here at 8:30 AM, on Saturday?
Clever idea.
I cannot wait!
Thanks for meeting with me today, Professor.
I do not understand last week's lecture on blood types.
Could you please explain it to me?
No problem, Angela.
First, let us see what you do understand.
Can you tell me about blood types?
There are four types of blood: A, B, AB, and O.
Good!
How is your blood type determined?
You get your blood type from both your parents.
Your blood type is a combination of genes from your father and your mother.
That is right.
Before the lecture, I always thought that all blood was the same.
Why cannot two different blood types of mix?
In some ways, every person's blood is the same.
But it is extremely dangerous to mix two different blood types.
Your blood cells may begin to stick together.
If you are given the wrong type of blood in a hospital, you could die.
I see.
So, that is why blood types must be matched in the hospital.
And this must be done before blood is given to anyone.
Exactly!
Mom, Danielle's on my side of the car again.
Tell her to move over!
Listen, both of you, I have had enough of your nonsense.
Sit still, be quiet, and enjoy the scenery!
Mom, is Toronto still far away?
It is going to take a long time to get there, so read your book.
I do not like to read in the car because it gives me a headache.
Can we put a CD in?
I suppose so, but it had better not be rap music.
That music is awful, and I cannot believe you children listen to it.
Oh, please, can we play some rap music?
You might like it, Mom.
Well, only if you promise that there is no bad language in it.
There is not any bad language, I promise!
All right, I will play the CD, but it will be at the volume I choose.
Thanks, Mom.
Have I ever told you about the songs I liked at your age?
People listened to real music in those days.
Oh, Mom! Rap is real music, too!
I finished my report on the French Revolution last night.
How did you finish it so fast?
I am still trying to find books about it.
There was something about the French Revolution on TV last week.
I printed the names of all the people who were on the show.
What did you do next?
I went to the library and looked for their books.
It was extremely easy, especially because I already understood what they wanted to say.
I guess I could have done that, but I missed the TV show.
Why did MS Discard make us write about French history, anyway?
She is a French language teacher, not a history teacher.
MS Discard said that if we want to understand the language, we should understand the culture.
I do not know if I speak better French, but I know more about French history now.
If the French Revolution had never happened, French would be a quite different language.
You are right.
I am going to talk to MS Discard now.
I will see you later.
So, how does it feel to have a new baby brother in the house?
It is exciting, but not as easy as I thought it would be, because the baby cries constantly.
I love my baby brother, but I do not like all that noise!
I know! When my baby sister was born, she cried and slept all the time.
I had to help change diapers and feed her.
I hope I never have to change a diaper!
My mom and dad do an excellent job of that.
I learned how to heat the bottle to the right temperature, though.
Having a new baby around is challenging work.
What do you like most about your new brother?
He is cute, and everyone says he looks like me, but with darker hair.
Smaller too, of course!
He laughs when I tickle his little feet.
When he grows up a bit, I will teach him how to ride a bicycle, and we can also play games together!
I am going to be the best big brother in the world!
You know, Kim, I think our new boss does not like me.
I do not understand why.
That is not true, Trevor!
Why, just this morning I heard her say you are a particularly good employee.
She said you work extremely hard every day.
That is news to me.
I wish she would say it to me, but she just criticizes everything I do.
You are being too sensitive.
Do you really think so?
I just need a vacation.
I have not had one for years.
It is not good to work so hard, Trevor.
A vacation is a great idea.
How about you?
Are you happy at work these days?
Yes, I am really enjoying working for this new boss.
That is why I am surprised that you think she criticizes your work.
She is helping you to improve your work.
She is just trying to help.
I did not realize that.
Now that I think about it, you are right.
I feel much better.
Good! Let us go for lunch!
How long have you been a school principal, MR Shin?
I have been a school principal for 18 years.
What made you get involved in education?
When I was 12 years old, I read an article about how the human brain works.
I studied extremely hard.
I tried to use my brain well.
Soon, I began to get interested in education.
I see!
After college, I became a teacher.
I was given the position of principal 12 years later.
Do you ever wish that you had done something else?
When I first started as a principal, I missed being a teacher.
I liked spending time with children and helping them learn and grow.
However, I knew that I could do a lot of good as a principal.
You have certainly done a lot of good, MR Shin!
You started a special program to send all the students in your school to college!
I have been planning to do that for some time.
I am glad the program is so successful.
Unit 28 Bill Gates
Look at this article I am reading.
It says here that Microsoft made over $36 billion in 2004.
Wow!
I wish I were Bill Gates, the owner of Microsoft!
Is it just because of the money?
Of course!
You can donate a lot of money to help other people.
Bill Gates donates millions to charity every year.
He also employs about 55,000 people in eighty-five different countries.
I heard that he got interested in computers when he was young.
That is right.
He started programming computers when he was 13 years old.
Really?
Yes, Then he studied computers at Harvard University.
He was a Harvard graduate?
This shows how important education is to success.
Actually, Bill Gates decided to drop out of Harvard.
He was an excellent student.
But he did not want to graduate.
Why not?
He had a dream.
He dreamed that computers would be in every home and office in the world.
I see!
He decided to follow his dream.
Yes, He made the right decision!
Stop yawning, Jason!
I am sorry, MS Terry.
I cannot help it!
You can!
You yawn because your lungs need more oxygen.
When you need more oxygen, you open your mouth wide and take in a lot of air.
What can I do to stop yawning?
You should go outside into the fresh air and breathe deeply.
Then you will not need to yawn anymore.
Your lungs will have lots of oxygen.
We just came in from recess, so why am I yawning?
Are you tired? Being tired also makes you yawn.
This is because your body needs rest.
Oxygen helps your body rest.
Sleeping rests your body and makes you take long, deep breaths.
Then, why do I yawn when I am bored, MS Terry?
Well, Jason, when you are bored, you are not breathing deeply enough.
The best way to stop yawning from boredom is to do something interesting.
If you cannot do that, try taking deep breaths.
This will not stop the boredom, but it will help you stop yawning.
Did you hear that a new gym opened on one of the streets nearby?
That is great news!
I have gained some weight, and I would like to lose it through exercise.
I need to lose weight, too, and I have always wanted to take yoga classes.
Do you know if the new gym offers yoga classes?
I am not sure.
I am planning to go there on Friday evening to look around.
Do you want to join me?
Let me check my schedule for this week.
I am too busy on Friday, so can we go on Saturday afternoon instead?
Sure, We can see what the new gym has to offer, and get some exercise, too.
It is fun to work out in a gym with other people.
We might even meet new people with similar hobbies!
Hold on, let us see what the gym looks like first before we start planning anything else.
Let us meet for lunch at the West End Cafe before we go.
It might be the last delicious meal we eat!
Good plan!
This burger is delicious!
Do you want some?
No, thank you.
I am working out at the gym these days.
I want to be healthy, so I have also started eating good, fresh food.
You are exercising?
That is fantastic!
When did you start thinking about your weight and staying in shape?
Last month I had a check-up.
My doctor told me that I should be leading a much healthier lifestyle now that I am getting older.
Now, I try to eat small, regular meals instead of one or two big meals a day.
I see.
What types of food do you usually eat now?
I eat lots of fruit and vegetables.
I try to limit carbohydrates like bread, rice, and pasta.
I also try not to eat sugary foods.
Oh dear!
I love sugary foods, especially cakes.
Well, try to eat food that is good for you.
You need to take care of yourself.
You are right.
I should start thinking about a healthier lifestyle.
But first, I am going to finish my burger!
I have lost seven pounds in one week!
Skipping breakfast really works.
I do not think that is a clever idea.
Why not?
People who skip breakfast eat more at the next meal.
Eating breakfast is especially important.
Breakfast gives you energy for the day.
Well, I eat one big meal a day at dinnertime.
Having one meal a day is not good.
You should have several small meals a day.
You will have more energy that way.
You are right.
I have been feeling really tired lately.
What do you usually eat?
I only eat salads now.
Salads alone may not be nutritious enough.
So, what should I eat?
You need some protein and carbohydrates.
It is important to eat a good variety of food at each meal.
You should have balanced meals.
Make sure you eat cereals, fruits and vegetables, and some bread or rice.
You also need milk and dairy products, and some meat.
You will be healthier.
You will have more energy.
You will even look better!
I am so excited!
I just got back from the travel agency.
Travel agency?
Where are you going?
I am planning to go to Canada on vacation.
Canada! How exciting!
How long are you going for?
I am going for a month.
I want to see as much as I can!
You are so lucky!
What places are you going to visit?
First, I will spend a few days in Vancouver.
Then I will take a train through the Rocky Mountains.
Oh, you are riding through the Rockies!
That is exciting!
Then I will fly to Toronto and take a bus to Niagara Falls.
Did you know that you can take a boat under that huge waterfall?
It is called Maid of the Mist.
Wow! That is an amazing thing to do!
You are so lucky!
Well, I hope I do not get seasick!
I will finish my trip in Nova Scotia.
I want to eat lobster for dinner every night.
And I would like to bike around some small fishing villages, too.
Have a wonderful time and take lots of pictures!

name_lesson: A Trip to Europe (Travel and Transport)

list_detail.w_english: Where are you going on vacation this year, Andre?
I am going to Europe with my parents.
We are going to take a tour of France, Italy, and Germany.
Oh! That will be such fun!
How long will you be gone?
Three weeks.
We are going in the summer, so I will not miss any school.
What will you do there?
We are going to visit historical sites, like the Coliseum in Rome.
We will also see famous museums, like the Louvre in Paris.
And, of course, we are going to the top of the Eiffel Tower.
How will you travel from one country to another?
There is a famous train that goes all over Europe.
It is called the Euro rail.
I wish I could go with you!
My family is going to the seashore again, just like last year.
I would like to go somewhere I have never been.
Do not worry, Julie.
I will take lots of pictures, and I will buy you a souvenir.
Thank you!
I will collect some seashells from the beach for you.
Thanks!
Hi, I have not seen you for two whole weeks!
Where did you go on your vacation?
I visited my cousin in New Mexico.
I had a wonderful time!
Mexico? I thought you went to the US.
I did.
New Mexico is a state in the southwestern US.
It is between Texas and Arizona.
Guess what?
A lot of Americans do not know that New Mexico is a state.
The license plates on cars in New Mexico also say "USA".
This is so that people do not get confused and think the driver is from Mexico.
That is funny!
So, tell me what you did in New Mexico.
My favorite part was visiting Carlsbad Caverns.
There are thirty miles of caves!
In one cave, we had to wear hats with lights on them so we could see in the dark.
Sometimes we had to crawl through very narrow tunnels on our hands and knees.
Were not you scared?
No, it was a lot of fun!
I am going to visit my cousin again next year.
You should come with me!
Unit 39 A Good Way to Travel
Traveling is a good hobby.
If you have extraordinarily little money, backpacking is an effective way to travel.
Many students like to backpack.
They can travel cheaply.
They can travel to many places.
These travelers carry their belongings in large backpacks.
They are called backpackers.
Backpackers take buses or trains to save money.
They camp outdoors to sleep.
If they stay in a city, they may go to a hostel.
A hostel is like a hotel.
Hotels are not cheap.
Hostels are ridiculously cheap.
Travelers often share rooms at hostels.
There are only a few toilets and baths.
People share them, too.
Hostels are a good place to meet other travelers.
You can make friends.
They can tell you about fun things to do in the area.
Many hostels have kitchens.
These kitchens have stoves.
Some have toasters.
You can buy your food from a store.
Then, you can cook at the hostel.
This is cheaper than eating out.
Just remember to clean up when you are done!

name_lesson: A Picnic by the River (Nature and the Environment)

list_detail.w_english: This is a good spot.
Let us stop and have our picnic next to the river.
Clever idea.
Walking always makes me hungry.
I am ready for lunch.
We can sit here on the grass.
Oh no! Someone forgot to throw these empty paper bags away.
There is litter everywhere!
Why do people always leave litter around?
It is not a wonderful thing to do.
It spoils other people's picnics.
They are lazy.
Or they just do not care.
Look, there are some empty cans and glass bottles under that tree, too.
People should clean up before they leave, and not leave litter lying around.
That's right.
Well, after our picnic, let us pick up all the litter we can and take it out of here.
OK! And next week, let us come back with friends and pick up some more.
Clever idea!

name_lesson: Let us Recycle! (Nature and the Environment)

list_detail.w_english: Hi, Jane!
Have you heard about the new laws to help people recycle?
I heard about them on the news last night.
I do not think I like them.
The government wants to keep the environment clean by recycling paper, metal.
And glass instead of throwing these things away.
But who wants to pay an extra fifty cents each time you buy a cup of coffee?
That is a lot of money!
Fifty cents?
It is only five cents extra for a paper cup.
I thought it was fifty cents!
No, it is only five cents.
Do not worry.
And you can get your money back when you return the cup.
That's fair.
Well, the government is right.
I will return all the paper coffee cups I use from now on.
Good! We all need to recycle.
It helps to keep the environment clean.
Excuse me.
I have a problem with my rose bush.
It used to produce a lot of pink roses.
But now it does not produce any flowers at all.
I see.
That does seem like a problem.
Do the leaves on the plant look healthy?
Not really.
The leaves used to be very green.
Now, most of them have turned brown.
Well, your rose bush needs some fertilizer.
OK, What sort of fertilizer do you think I should use?
This liquid fertilizer is particularly good.
It will help make your rose leaves green again.
Then the plant should produce roses quite soon.
The fertilizer costs about ten dollars.
How long will it take for my rose bush to recover?
About two weeks, I think.
Great, I will take it.
Thank you so much for your help.
You are welcome!
I want to go bird watching tomorrow.
Do you know a good area for birds?
There is a quiet park near here.
There are always many beautiful birds there.
Will I be able to see diverse types of birds in this area?
Yes, I think so.
If you use binoculars, you can see the birds, even if they are far away.
Great! I have a book about all the diverse types of birds.
It seems as if you really like bird watching.
Yes, I do!
Would you like to come with me tomorrow?
No, thank you.
Bird watching is boring.
That is not true!
Birds are remarkably interesting.
Some birds have colorful feathers.
Some birds sing beautiful songs.
Some birds make special nests to lay eggs in.
Really? I will go bird watching one day!

name_lesson: An Easy Way to Shop (Science and Technology)

list_detail.w_english: Hey, Steve.
Look at my new MP3 player!
Wow, It looks cool!
Where did you buy it?
I bought it online at an electronics website.
I am not particularly good at using a computer.
Is it hard to buy things online?
It is easy.
All you do is go to the website and choose the item you want to look at.
There are so many items to choose from on the website!
After you choose what you want to buy, you click on the "check out" button.
That does seem easy!
Yes, it is.
It only takes about a week for your item to come.
Of course, if you are in a hurry, you can pay more to get it sent faster.
Do you pay for the item when it comes?
No, you must pay for it online with a credit card.
I need to check my messages.
How are you going to do that?
We are in the middle of the freeway!
I am going to use my cell phone.
Have not you ever done that?
No, I just use my cell phone to talk to other people.
Now you can also use a cell phone to send and receive short text messages.
It is especially useful.
How do you send a message that way?
I just use the keys on the phone to type a short message.
Then I press the "send" button.
It is cheaper than making a phone call.
That is a great idea!
You can save both time and money that way.
Right, All my friends usually send me text messages now.
Thanks for telling me about this.
I will have to try it!
You are welcome.
I think you will find it useful.
Joe asked me something about science just now.
But I did not know the answer.
I am good at science.
Ask me.
OK, Why is the sky blue?
I will explain it in a straightforward way.
Light comes through the air from the sun in waves.
The light is in many colors, right?
Right, Blue light waves are smaller than air molecules.
They sometimes get absorbed by these molecules.
OK, What happens then?
Then the blue light waves scatter in many directions.
Your eyes see this blue light from above you, after it leaves the air molecules.
So that is what makes the sky blue!
What happens to the other colors?
They reflect off the things that they hit.
Your shirt is red because our eyes see the red light reflected from it.
Now I understand why the sky is blue!
I just bought a digital camera!
What is wrong with your old camera?
Nothing, I bought this one because I want to store my pictures on my computer.
I see.
I can also remove pictures that are not particularly good.
I do not have to print them.
I like to print all my photos.
That is why I like the old cameras.
Oh, you can print digital photos, too.
Many shops will print them for you.
Really?
Yes, You can even buy a good printer and do it from home.
That seems easy! How do you store these digital pictures?
You can store the pictures on your computer.
But you might run out of space.
I save all the pictures I like on compact discs.
You can store more than seven hundred photos on one CD!
Great!
I should get a digital camera, too.

name_lesson: The Summer Music Festival (Art and Culture)

list_detail.w_english: Have you heard about the music festival next summer?
I read that it is going to have about twenty different bands playing in it.
I think I did hear someone talking about it.
Are you planning to go?
I will go if I can get tickets.
I heard that people are going to line up overnight to get tickets.
I might line up overnight, too.
I do not think I want to line up all night long!
Well, I am going to do it.
It is going to be a great music festival that I will not want to miss.
Maybe.
Do you know how much the tickets are going to cost?
I am not sure, but I think each ticket will be about $75.
That is a lot of money!
I do not think I want to spend that much on a ticket.
Good luck, anyway!
Are you going to the school play on Saturday night?
The school play?
I did not know there was going to be a play on Saturday night.
Yes, I heard about it in English class yesterday.
I think it will be good.
Who told you about it?
MS Martin, our English teacher, told us all about it.
This is the drama club's first play of the year.
What is the play about?
I hope it is nothing boring.
Can you guess what it is?
Oh, come on, tell me please!
It is The Sound of Music.
Really?
I watched The Sound of Music on TV last month!
It is particularly good!
Are you sure?
Of course, I am sure, that is what MS Martin said.
Would you like to watch the play with me on Saturday night?
That would be great!
Let us go early so we get good seats!
Hi Cindy.
Where are you going?
Good afternoon, MS White, I am going to ballet class.
Ballet class?
I did not know you were studying ballet.
How long have you been studying ballet?
Today is my first day, and I do not want to go.
My mom and dad want me to learn ballet.
I am not sure I want to learn how to dance.
I used to learn ballet too when I was your age.
Now I teach ballet in a dance school.
Oh, I did not know that!
Where do you teach your classes?
Down the street at Easy Steps Dance Academy.
Ballet is fun to learn, and it is a very graceful dance.
You will need to learn the steps and practice a lot of course, but I think you will enjoy it.
I hope so!
Well, have some fun dancing!
Oh no, it is raining!
I wanted to go to the beach today.
Well, I am visiting a haunted house this afternoon.
You can come with me if you like.
A haunted house? What is it like?
It is dark, with lots of old furniture and pictures on the walls.
It is called a haunted house because it is full of ghosts!
You are joking, right?
I do not believe in ghosts!
Where is the haunted house?
The house is in the old forest.
Oh! Are you sure you want to go?
What is wrong?
I thought you did not believe in ghosts!
Well, I do not really believe in ghosts, but.
That is OK, I do not believe in ghosts, either!
I was only joking.
The old house is not really haunted.
It is just an incredibly old, empty house.
Whew, I am glad to hear that!
Sure, I will come with you!

name_lesson: A Big Screen TV (Leisure and Entertainment)

list_detail.w_english: I am thinking about buying a big screen TV.
Wow! I have seen those in the store.
They cost a lot of money.
Can you afford to buy one?
They do cost a lot of money.
But I really enjoy watching TV.
It is much more fun to watch TV shows on a big screen.
I have never watched TV on a big screen.
Do you think the quality of the picture is good?
Yes, the quality is great.
When you watch soccer games, you feel like you are right there on the field!
When you buy the TV, can I come over to your house?
Then, I can enjoy watching TV on the big screen with you!
I must save some money to buy the TV first.
It will be a few months before I can afford to buy it!
Are you going to the new Tim Cross movie tonight?
I do not know.
It looks kind of boring.
Really?
It looks quite interesting.
Besides, Tim Cross is a famous actor.
He may be famous, but I do not think he is a particularly good actor.
He always acts in the same sort of movie.
He never does anything different.
Well, at least you think he is good looking, right?
No, not really.
He always looks so sleepy.
But most girls think he is handsome.
That is why he is so famous.
None of my friends think he is good looking at all.
I used to like him a few years ago, but now he is not handsome at all.
Hey! I just got a haircut to try to look more like him!
Well, that explains why I do not like your new haircut!
Hi, Steve!
Thanks for coming to my housewarming party.
Hello, Sue!
Thanks for inviting me to see your lovely new home.
It is beautiful!
Thank you.
I am glad you like it.
Did you decorate your house all by yourself?
Yes, I did.
I traveled around Europe last year.
I got some beautiful furniture for my house there.
Do you plan to go on a new trip this summer?
Yes, I am planning to visit China.
That is great! How long will you be there?
I will be there for a month.
You can find some beautiful things in China for your new house.
You should go shopping while you are there.
Of course! It will be fun to go shopping there.
Please help yourself to the refreshments.
Thanks, The food looks delicious!

name_lesson: Where Is Your Homework? (School and Family)

list_detail.w_english: Did you finish your homework for English class?
Homework?
There was not any homework.
We had to finish reading a book and then author a 200-word essay on it.
I do not think MS Jones gave us any homework.
I always write what I must do in my notebook.
Did she really tell us to author an essay?
Yes, Look, here is my essay.
See?
Oh no!
What am I going to do?
We have only got 10 minutes before class starts.
I do not know.
MS Jones will let you hand it in tomorrow.
Hey, let me copy your essay.
I will change a few words.
MS Jones will never know.
No, I am sorry.
That is not the right thing to do.
Oh, come on! I thought you were my friend.
I am your friend.
That is why I am not letting you copy my work!
Will you play any sports this school year?
I want to play hockey.
But I am not sure if I will have enough time.
I am on the school soccer team.
I am also going to take up swimming.
You are going to be on the soccer team and swim, too?
Yes.
That seems like a lot.
You will be terribly busy!
Do you think you will have any free time?
I will play soccer with my school team during the week.
I will go swimming during the weekend.
When will you have time to do your homework?
And when will you study?
I do my homework after school every day.
I study every weekend.
My mother will not let me play sports until I have done all my work.
Well, I hope you find enough time for both schoolwork and sports.
Good luck!

name_lesson: Arts and Crafts Class (School and Family)

list_detail.w_english: Hi, Mom.
I am back from arts and crafts class.
Look at what I am wearing.
Well, you are wearing a blue T-shirt and jeans.
Sure, but what else am I wearing?
Oh, those earrings are very pretty!
Is that what you are learning to make this week in arts and crafts class?
Yes, we are learning to make jewelry from beads this week.
The beads come in assorted colors and shapes.
First, we decide what sort of jewelry we want to make.
Then, we choose the beads we want, and string them on transparent plastic wire.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
Yes!
Tom made a bead necklace for his sister, and I made some earrings.
Guess what, Mom?
I made a pair of earrings for you, too!
Oh, these are very pretty!
Thank you very much.
Next week, I am going to make a necklace.
Hi, Mom!
Guess what?
We got our English test back today.
I got the highest score in my class!
Oh, Billy, I am glad you did so well!
You worked hard for that test.
Thanks, Mom.
I am hungry.
What is for dinner?
We are going to your aunt's place for dinner tonight.
It is your grandfather's birthday today, remember?
Oh no, I forgot!
I do not have a birthday gift for Grandpa!
Do not worry.
I bought a gift for him yesterday from the three of us.
Anyway, your English test score is a good gift for your grandfather.
The whole family will be at the party tonight.
All your aunts, uncles, and cousins are coming.
I have not seen the whole family in a long time.
Well, you will see them tonight.
Now, hurry up and get ready.
OK, When are we leaving?
When your father gets home from work.

name_lesson: A Problem at the Office (People and Work)

list_detail.w_english: I had a big problem at the office today!
What happened?
I could not use my computer all day!
Was it because of a virus?
Yes, I opened a file that had a virus.
Oh no, You must be careful when you open files in your email.
A virus can make your whole computer crash.
It was an accident!
I did not know the file had a virus.
I will be more careful next time.
What did you do next?
I asked a computer repair person to come to the office.
He worked all day to repair my computer.
But the real problem is that I may have lost some of my work.
Do not worry.
Your work is still on your computer.
I can help you get it back.
Next time, make sure you have back-up files.
Just in case it happens again!
What do you want to be when you grow up, Mark?
I want to be a teacher.
I think I would like to help children learn.
Well, you know, teachers work extremely hard, and they are not paid much money.
I do not care about money.
Teaching is an important job.
What subject do you want to teach?
I want to teach mathematics, like MS Kim.
She makes learning fun.
I did not know that I would like math so much until I joined her class.
Now, mathematics is my favorite subject.
If you want to teach math, you will have to work hard and learn it well.
No problem! I got an A on the mathematics examination last week.
With good teachers like MS Kim, learning is easy.
I want to be a teacher, too.
But I want to teach English, not math!
We are having a summer sale.
Everything is 50% off the normal price.
Really?
Everything?
Yes, Everything is on sale, including sunglasses, hats, and bags.
All the summer clothes are on sale, too.
I do need some new sunglasses.
I lost mine when I went to the beach this summer.
Oh, these are nice.
What is the price of these?
There is no price tag on them.
Well, sir, there is no price tag on those sunglasses because they are mine!
Really?
I would like to get a pair of sunglasses just like these.
Where did you get them?
Actually, I got them for $15 at Super Glasses.
There is a Super Glasses store in this mall, is not there?
Yes, But let me show you the sunglasses we have on sale.
No, thanks.
I think I will just go to Super Glasses!
I want to find a part-time job.
Do you have any ideas about where I should look for work?
Have you looked in the newspaper?
There are lots of job advertisements in the newspaper.
Yes, I have.
But there were no jobs in which I was interested.
Did you search on the Internet?
Many companies put job advertisements on the Internet.
No, I have not looked on the Internet.
I do not know what I should search for.
There are many websites that have job postings that you could look at.
You could also search for the type of job you are interested in.
OK,Thanks for telling me what I need to do.
I will start my Internet search right now.
I have a list of some websites.
You could start looking at those first.
That might save you some time.
That would be especially useful.
Thanks!
Did you watch the Boston marathon?
Yes, I went to Boston to see it.
You were in Boston for the marathon?
That is right.
My friend is a runner, so I went there to watch her run.
We traveled to Boston together.
You are so lucky!
Which part of the marathon did you see?
I watched the entire race, from start to finish.
I do not know how the runners can finish the whole race!
It is so long and difficult!
I could never do something like that.
I tried to run a marathon once.
It was difficult.
I just cannot run like my friend can.
Yes, running a marathon is not an easy thing to do.
How did your friend do in the race?
She did quite well!
She was not the fastest runner, but she was in the top fifty.
Hi, Alice.
What have you been doing?
You look tired.
I stayed up late last night to watch the Olympics.
We won a gold medal for men's basketball.
We also won the silver medal for women's tennis.
That is great! What about gymnastics?
The men's team did not do so well.
But the women's team won the silver medal.
I have not had much time to watch, but I saw the opening ceremony.
What have you been doing this summer?
I have been playing baseball and taking swimming lessons.
I like to watch baseball.
I can come and watch your team play some time.
When do you usually play?
We have a game this weekend.
Why do not you come and watch us play in the park?
Sure!
Just let me know what time the game starts.
See you later.
Bye!
Oh! My legs are so sore!
Really?
What did you do during the weekend?
I went inline skating with my friends at the park.
Did you have fun?
Yes, I did.
But it was also my first time, so it was difficult.
I was scared that I would fall.
After a brief time, my muscles were tired.
Next time will be easier.
You just need more practice.
What about you?
What did you do during the weekend?
Actually, I also went inline skating.
I go every weekend with my father.
We usually skate about twenty kilometers each time.
Wow! How can you skate so far?
Your muscles must be strong.
I have been skating for three years now.
You could skate that far, too.
You just need to build up your muscles.
Let us go skating together next weekend.
OK!
I am planning to go on a bicycle trip around Europe.
Why do you want to go on a bicycle trip?
It is an environmentally friendly way to travel.
What do you have to do to go on a bicycle trip?
Before the trip, I will need to ride my bicycle a lot.
That will make me fit and strong.
I also need to get some equipment.
What kind of equipment will you need?
I need road maps of the countries I am going to visit.
I also need strong bags to carry clothes and food.
I need to carry all these things on my bicycle.
Are you traveling with another person?
Yes, I am going with a friend of mine.
He likes bicycle trips.
I wish I could go on a bicycle trip, too!
Well, do not get too many flat tires!
Is not it great that there are not any classes on Monday?
We have a three-day weekend!
That is right!
Do you have any special plans?
My family is taking a trip to Las Cruces.
I am really looking forward to it.
Have you ever been there?
No, but I have heard about it.
Is it nice?
Yes, there are so many things to see.
The city is famous for its nuts.
What kind of nuts?
Pecans.
There are many pecan trees growing in and around the city.
I like pecans.
How far away is Las Cruces from here?
It only takes about four hours by car if you use the freeway and drive directly south.
That certainly makes for an easy trip.
When are you leaving?
We are going on Saturday morning.
We will be back on Monday evening.
Have a wonderful time!
Bring me some pecans!
I want to go on a trip to China.
How long do you want to stay?
Four or five days.
We have a particularly good package tour that is for four days and three nights.
OK, What can you tell me about it?
Well, you will fly directly to Beijing.
Your tour guide will meet you at the airport and take you to your hotel.
Over the four days, you will do a lot of sightseeing.
You will see many famous landmarks.
Like the Summer Palace, the Forbidden City, and the Great Wall of China.
That sounds great!
What sort of transport will we use to get from one place to another?
You will take a bus with your tour group.
OK, Can I book this package tour now?
There will be five of us going on this trip.
Sure!
You are so lucky, Marian.
You are leaving for Hawaii in five hours!
I never travel because I hate flying in airplanes.
I do not like buses, either.
That does not matter, Dean.
There are other ways to get around.
You should take the train somewhere.
That is true.
It has been a long time since I last traveled.
I have always wanted to take a long train trip.
What is stopping you?
Go to the travel agent now and ask about train trips!
What do you think the fares are like?
I am not sure what train fares are like now.
It depends on your destination.
That is a question you will have to ask a travel agent.
Can you suggest a good person to talk to?
My travel agent is always extremely helpful.
Here is his phone number.
Thanks! I will call him right now.
Where is the phone?
